unit_counters.reason: Look for the Chieftains unique tech
A mass of Mangudai can quickly take them down, but only with good micro to avoid their shots (which could be dangerous)
They will very quickly take each other down, in this case the player with the better micro ability will have an advantage
Excellent if they're able to fire safely from a distance at masses of Archers
